content: You can archive the unnecessary rooms or contact the {{productName}} administrator to upgrade the tariff plan.

comment.text: This translation key is used to display a message indicating that unnecessary rooms can be archived or that the administrator needs to contact them for tariff plan upgrades. It appears in the QuotasBar component and provides context for the user when they are not authorized administrators.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'tariff plan' is not accurately translated. 'خطة التعريف' (khitat al-ta'rif) translates to 'definition plan' or 'identification plan', which doesn't convey the meaning of a tariff plan.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider translating 'tariff plan' as 'خطة التسعير' (khitat al-tas'eer) which means 'pricing plan'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'archived' is translated as 'arxivləşdirə'. While technically correct, a more natural phrasing in Azerbaijani might be 'silə bilərsiniz' (you can delete) or 'arxaya göndərə bilərsiniz' (you can send to archive). The current translation is a bit literal.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Tarif planını təkmilləşdirmək üçün lazımsız otaqları silə və ya arxaya göndərə bilərsiniz.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Azerbaijani translation maintains the '{{productName}}' placeholder, which is appropriate, but a more consistent capitalization style might be preferred if the English version also uses capitalization in the product name.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: No change needed, but ensure consistency with English version's capitalization of '{{productName}}'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The verb 'aktualizoval' (updated) doesn't quite fit the context. Upgrading a tariff plan implies a change, not simply an update.  'Aktualizovat' is more for a software update.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Změnit tarifní plán (Change the tariff plan) or Obnovit tarifní plán (Renew/Refresh the tariff plan).

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The sentence structure is slightly awkward.  It's a bit clunky to have 'aby tarifní plán aktualizoval' (so that the tariff plan updates).
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: …nebo se obraťte na administrátora {{productName}} ohledně změny tarifního plánu (…or contact the {{productName}} administrator regarding a change to the tariff plan).

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The English phrase "tariff plan" is translated as "tilauksen". While "tilauksen" can mean 'subscription' or 'order', it doesn't precisely convey the meaning of a 'tariff plan' which refers to a pricing structure or tier. A more accurate translation might be something like 'hintasuunnitelman' or 'hintasopimuksen'.

The phrase "selecta un alt plan tarifar" doesn't accurately reflect the English phrase "to upgrade the tariff plan." 'Selecta' implies choosing, while 'upgrade' implies increasing the level or scope. A more accurate translation would convey the upgrade aspect.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Puteți arhiva sălile inutile sau contactați administratorul {{productName}} pentru a actualiza planul tarifar.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "ඔබට අනවශ්‍ය කාමර සංරක්ෂණය කළ හැකිය" is a literal translation of 'You can archive the unnecessary rooms'. While accurate, it could be more natural in Sinhala. A more natural phrasing might be 'ඔබට අවශ්‍ය නොවූ කාමරයන් archivé කල හැකිය' or 'අවශ්‍යතාවයක් නොමැති කාමරයන් archivé කල හැකිය'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ඔබට අවශ්‍ය නොවූ කාමරයන් archivé කල හැකිය

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'උත්ශ්‍රේණි කිරීමට' (uthsreniyama kirimata) is a bit formal and doesn't flow naturally in this context. A simpler and more common word would be 'යහපත් කිරීමට' (yahapath kirimata) or 'දියුණු කිරීමට' (diyunu kirimata).

The phrase "aby vám zvýšil tarifný plán" is an awkward and inaccurate translation of 'to upgrade the tariff plan'. The Slovak phrasing implies the administrator is *giving* the user a tariff plan, rather than facilitating an upgrade.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider alternatives like "aby vám upravil tarifný plán" (to adjust the tariff plan) or "aby vám zlepšil tarifný plán" (to improve the tariff plan). A more accurate, though potentially more formal, translation would be "aby vám overil tarifný plán" (to verify the tariff plan).

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "upgrade the tariff plan" is translated as "nadgradnjo tarifnega načrta". While technically correct, a more natural phrasing in Slovenian might be "za posodobitev tarifnega načrta" (to update the tariff plan).
The word 'просторије' (prostoriye) is a somewhat archaic or formal term for 'rooms'. A more common and natural-sounding term would be 'собе' (sobe).
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Можете архивирати непотребне собе или контактирати {{productName}} администратора да бисте надоградили тарифни план.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "to upgrade the tariff plan" is not the most natural way to express this in Ukrainian. A more common and accurate phrasing would be 'щоб оновити тарифний план' or 'щоб змінити тарифний план'.

The word 'archive' (in the English content) is translated as 'sao lưu' (backup) in Vietnamese, which doesn't accurately convey the meaning of archiving (removing from view, but retaining data). A more appropriate translation for 'archive' in this context would be 'lưu trữ' or 'xóa khỏi danh sách'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Bạn có thể lưu trữ các phòng không cần thiết hoặc xóa khỏi danh sách các phòng không cần thiết hoặc liên hệ với quản trị viên {{productName}} để nâng cấp gói dịch vụ.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: “费用版本” doesn't accurately translate “tariff plan”. A more accurate translation would be something like “套餐计划” or “计费方案”.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 您可以存档不需要的房间或联系{{productName}}管理员升级套餐计划。
